channel.title: How can I exchange the Bitbay coins I have?
channel.description:
I can't find an exchange who accept the bitbay coins: I tried to send to Latoken, but it don't allow bitbay deposits; I tried Blocknet but it have no market for Bitbay.
Could you help me please?

item.title: How can I exchange the Bitbay coins I have?
item.dc:creator: @tradersnow
item.description:
@tradersnow wrote:

Currently, LA Token or OTC transactions are the only places to trade BAY.

LA Token link: https://exchange.latoken.com/exchange/BAY-BTC

Since Blocknet is a decentralized exchange, they will require some additional work to integrate the dynamic peg before users can trade BAY there.

Like @Craig_Claussen mentioned, LA Token’s deposits are currently paused while they fix a small issue today. They should be reopened again soon.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I exchange the Bitbay coins I have?

item.title: How can I exchange the Bitbay coins I have?
item.dc:creator: @Craig_Claussen
item.description:
@Craig_Claussen wrote:

LATOKEN.com has had some issues with deposits. We are waiting for an update from them hopefully by the end of the day (Europe time)
